channel.title: How do i change my exp rates?

item.title: How do i change my exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

In client.java (with most servers) search: xprate

item.title: How do i change my exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @Nastay Nastay
item.description:
@Nastay wrote:

It’s fairly simple, now i’m not at home so I won’t be able to check, but from what I can remember is…
Go to client.java (in your source)
Search: return 99 (or whatever your max stat is)
and you should see something in that area involving exp/xp just change the number, now sometimes that won’t always work, it’ll save but if you got a server that’s a dick like mine, you gotta search harder to change the exp rate like combat, with a weapon etc. it’s bullshit lol, anyways hope I helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my exp rates?
